entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is Mr. Crouch's house-elf, who is found unconscious on the ground.

entities.name: mr_crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a Ministry wizard who is staring at Winky in shock and disbelief.

entities.name: barty_crouch
entities.description: Barty Crouch is mentioned as the owner of Winky, implying that he is Mr. Crouch's son or relative.

entities.name: mr_diggory
entities.description: Mr. Diggory is a Ministry wizard who tries to calm down Mr. Crouch and tells him that there is no one else there.

entities.name: mr_weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a wizard who questions the possibility of Winky being responsible for the Dark Mark.

relationships.description: Winky is Mr. Crouch's house-elf, as mentioned in the text.
Mr. Weasley questions Winky's responsibility for the Dark Mark.
